Encounters in the Radiant Citadel

This encounter collection is a supplement for adventures set in "Journeys Through the Radiant Citadel". I assembled the collaborators, led the ten-person project, authored an encounter, and did the book layout.

Project LeadAdventure DesignLayoutAffinity SuiteFifth Edition Dungeons & Dragons
Out of Luck: A one-shot heist with hijinks and heart

Out of Luck is a D&D 5e heist adventure set in Umizu, a Radiant Citadel locale and coastal steampunk city-state inspired by pre-modern Japan. I created all aspects of this adventure, including the adventure design, layout, internal artwork, and cartography. It was featured in a D&D Beyond Community Spotlight.

Adventure DesignLayoutArtworkAffinity SuiteFifth Edition Dungeons & Dragons
Jukebox: The Karaoke Musical TTRPG

Jukebox is a rules-lite, GM-less karaoke roleplaying game that is an homage to musicals of the stage and screen. I designed, playtested, and laid out the entire game. The updated version, which includes developmental editing by Jacky Leung (Modiphius Entertainment) and cover art by Iliadele (Bad Bishop Games), is Kickstarting in November.

Project LeadOriginal Game DesignLayoutAffinity Suite
Project Management for TTRPGs Substack Series

I'm writing a Project Management series for TTRPGs on my substack, using Encounters in the Radiant Citadel as a case study. The series provides actionable project management advice, resources, and templates for project leads.

TutorialProject Management
Border Kingdoms 2023 (GameHole Con)

I authored one of the official Adventures League adventurers for Game Hole Con 2023: Trouble Brewing in Port Nyanzaru.

Adventure DesignFifth Edition Dungeons & Dragons
Weapons of Legend (Jeff Stevens Games)

I authored six magical weapons, including lore and unique mechanics, for this 5e supplement.

MechanicsFifth Edition Dungeons & Dragons
The TTRPG Collaboration Workbook (Big Bad Con Zinethology)

The TTRPG Collaboration Workbook was a commissioned zine for Big Bad Con's Zinethology. It's a 28-page workbook written and laid out by me and edited by Taylor Navarro.

Instructional DesignAffinity Publisher
Val and Tine's Disaster and Dust to Dust (Bob World Builder)

I wrote two adventures for the Bob World Builder Patreon.
